svg.text: ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ RANDOMIZATION UNITS │ ├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ │ │ USER-LEVEL (Most Common) │ │ ├── User ID or Device ID │ │ ├── Pros: Simple, consistent experience │ │ ├── Cons: Need logged-in users │ │ └── Use when: Standard A/B tests │ │ │ │ SESSION-LEVEL │ │ ├── Session ID │ │ ├── Pros: More samples, faster tests │ │ ├── Cons: Inconsistent user experience │ │ └── Use when: Session-specific features, performance │ │ │ │ PAGE/REQUEST-LEVEL │ │ ├── Request ID │ │ ├── Pros: Maximum samples, instant results │ │ ├── Cons: Very inconsistent, hard to attribute │ │ └── Use when: Backend optimizations, load testing │ │ │ │ CLUSTER-LEVEL │ │ ├── Geographic region, time period, network cluster │ │ ├── Pros: Handles network effects │ │ ├── Cons: Fewer units, less power │ │ └── Use when: Social features, marketplace changes │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
